name: bnj213
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ssrab3(hs0, c-bnj14(c0, c1, c2), c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c0))

body.origin:
|- wss(c-bnj14(c0, c1, c2), c1)
-| wceq(c-bnj14(c0, c1, c2), crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c0)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

-| diffsc(hs0, c2)
